name: Mika Event Bind
statusOutcome: En su momento de distracción, la cola de Mika se envuelve hábilmente en ambas muñecas y las une firmemente.
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles to free [TargetHisOrHer] wrists from [AttackerName]'s tail coiled around them...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] weakly struggles to free [TargetHisOrHer] wrists from [AttackerName]'s soft tail coiled around them...
restraintEscaped: And manages to free [TargetHisOrHer] arms from her restraining tail!
restraintEscapedFail: But her soft tail stays firmly coiled around [TargetName]'s wrists! Her tail gives you a domineering squeeze while [AttackerName] smiles back at you.'
